document.full_text: the remains of president salvador allende were exhumed and a second autopsy will be conducted to determine if he shot himself during a coup as his family has long believed.
document.title: exhumation of allende of chile aims to settle mystery
lines_and_colors: the remains of president salvador allende were exhumed and a second autopsy will be conducted to determine if he shot himself during a coup as his family has long believed.
